mapper.select: select f.id as id, f.content as content, f.created_time as created_time, u.username as author, COUNT(sc.id) as sComment_num from `f_comment` f left join `user` u on f.user_id = u.id left join `s_comment` sc on sc.f_comment_id = f.id where f.blog_id = #{blogId} group by f.id, f.content, f.id, f.created_time, u.username order by f.created_time desc
